doc.previous: Microwave heating technologies are based on the same principles as radio wave heating, although it is believed that radio wave heating is an improvement over microwave heating because its energy can penetrate farther into the oil shale formation.[58] The microwave heating process was tested by Global Resource Corporation.[59] Electro-Petroleum proposes electrically enhanced oil recovery by the passage of direct current between cathodes in producing wells and anodes located either at the surface or at depth in other wells. The passage of the current through the oil shale formation results in resistive Joule heating.[10]
doc.after: The dominant question for shale oil production is under what conditions shale oil is economically viable.
